modName: Anna Valerious -Companion from Van Helsing- Kate Beckinsale
summary: This mod introduces a reasonable facsimile of Kate Beckinsale as Anna Valerious, assistant to the famous vampire hunter in the movie Van Helsing. She is located in the Old Hroldan Inn and is a dual flurrying one hand Combat Rogue.  She can be had as either a Calculated Level 40 or Auto-Level companion.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12989-1-1339144863.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][color= ghostwhite][size= 4]Anna Valerious is a combat companion, she uses no magic or spells. She is classified as a Combat Rogue and has most of the one handed perks and several of the archery perks in her make up. Enjoy! :)[/b][/color][/size]

[b][color= grey][size= 4]
Game Race: Breton 
Hair: Dark Brown
Eyes: Dark Brown
Scaled Weight: 50
Height: 5\'6\"
Location: Old Hroldan Inn
Inventory: Iron Sword
Voice: Sultry

Required Files: ApachiiSkyHair Version 1.3 or later

Optional Files: To make her look like she does in my images
Eyes: Improved Eyes Skyrim by missjennabee: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9249
I used Bella\'s Better Females, Makeup variant 1 and (No Shine some pics) on her.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Calientes Darker Neater Eyebrows
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
Pretty Lips by Danariel
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

Her body in my images is CBBEv3 with Navetseas body \"Feminine Arms and Toned Abs\" textures. (She can be used with whatever body you prefer) (GlossTech V5 \"No Shine\" used in some pics)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

She is wearing Triss Armor Retextured by Psyke23 and oldholo (She will appear nude in your game!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708
[/b][/color][/size]
[B][COLOR=RED]***ApachiiSkyHair 1.3 or later is REQUIRED!***[/B][/COLOR]

[b]Thanks for checking out our mod and please endorse her if you like her! 

Regards,

FB[/b]
author: FalmerBane
